answers.answer: You should have his blood sugar levels checked - diabetes affects the sight, and if his blood sugar is high, it may lead to serious medical issues, sight only being one of them!
He needs to see an opthamologist as soon as possible. There is an eye forum here that has a eye doctor that might be more helpful. Go to forums and to E and look for eye problems .

It should be a visit to an optometrist. Also check the BP. I can't say for sure, but I seem to remember that if you're having vision issues, and your BP is up, you could be having a stroke. So yeah, do this quickly.
